last_episode_to_air.name: Doctor Freakstoolcrap
last_episode_to_air.overview: After an experiment by Beelzebutt goes horribly right, Boner must fight an immortal fusion of all the demons he has previously killed.

name: Bad Exorcist
overview: No demon is safe as Bogdan Boner, the alcohol-loving, self-taught exorcist-for-hire, returns with more inventive, obscene and deadly deeds.

episodes.name: Prohibition From Hell
episodes.overview: After a statue in hell gets defiled by a drunk demon, the Ruler of Hell raises the drinking age, causing an increase in thefts of alcohol on Earth.

episodes.name: The Law of Surprise
episodes.overview: After refusing a demon’s indecent proposal, Boner gets cursed with bad luck and experiences a long — and painful — day.

episodes.name: Antichristosaur
episodes.overview: Boner comes up with an idea to trick people into thinking his sidekick, Domino, is an evil demon. Unfortunately, the plan goes south pretty fast.

episodes.name: When the Devil Is At His Wits End He Sends A Woman
episodes.overview: After Boner eliminates two of his entrepreneurial henchmen, the Ruler of Hell sends a female demon to seduce him and settle the score.

episodes.name: Grim Slurper
episodes.overview: When an immortal monster and his servant come to Earth to feast on human envy, Boner’s usual extermination techniques don’t seem to work.

episodes.name: Double-Shot Bill
episodes.overview: Boner thirsts for revenge when a demon gunslinger who once almost killed him returns to Earth.

episodes.name: A Baby From Hell
episodes.overview: After a one-night stand with a handsome demon, a woman gives birth to a little monster who immediately starts terrorizing the hospital.

episodes.name: The Cursed Commercial
episodes.overview: A meatball commercial with a subliminal message turns people into ravenous demons who will do anything to lay their hands on the advertised delicacy.

episodes.name: The Golden Buddha
episodes.overview: When the demon gunslinger returns and steals a golden Buddha figurine, Boner comes up with a plan to capture the dangerous thief.

episodes.name: Horror At Castel Gandolfo
episodes.overview: When Pope Francis’ residence gets invaded by an atheist demon, only Boner — armed with his holy-water-thrower and crucifix-knuckle-duster — can help.

episodes.name: The Angel Wings
episodes.overview: The Ruler of Hell captures Boner’s illegitimate son and blackmails the exorcist into capturing an angel for him so he can take its wings.

episodes.name: Lucky Day
episodes.overview: A man becomes paralyzed after a demon rips off his legs in a dream. To end his nightmare, Boner has to get drunk to enter his subconscious.

episodes.name: The Possessed
episodes.overview: When a ruthless demon with the ability to inhabit the body of any living being comes to Earth, not even Boner is safe.

episodes.name: The Hell Vaccine
episodes.overview: Boner has no other choice than to vaccinate Marcinek when two demons possess him through hypnosis — but the cure is worse than the disease.

episodes.name: Ironvader
episodes.overview: A death metal band that Boner has a score to settle with makes the news, so he decides to go after them.

episodes.name: The Fallen Angel
episodes.overview: In exchange for assistance in finding an online troll who questioned his manhood, Boner agrees to help a fallen angel get back into heaven.

episodes.name: The Diabolic Cartel
episodes.overview: When a new drug wreaks havoc at a local club and Boner confronts the dealer selling it, a ruthless cartel from hell sends its soldiers after him.

episodes.name: Gravocop
episodes.overview: Boner fakes his own death to stop two demons when they partner with the owner of a funeral home to steal human souls.

episodes.name: Sick Leave
episodes.overview: Boner goes on sick leave — but his exorcism business can’t stop, so he works remotely through his clueless employees.

episodes.name: The Cemetarizer
episodes.overview: After a member of Boner’s crew gets hurt while they hunt for grave robbers, the exorcist has no choice but to punish the culprit.

episodes.name: The Vampire
episodes.overview: A man’s potato obsession turns him into a bulletproof, starch-craving monster. To stop him, Boner has to use a more unconventional approach.

episodes.name: Wanted Dead or Alive
episodes.overview: When Boner kills his dog, the Ruler of Hell puts out a bounty on him, turning everyone against the exorcist.

episodes.name: The Exorcist 2050 (1)
episodes.overview: In 2050, the Ruler of Hell decides to take revenge for years of humiliation caused by Boner and sets out to kill the now retired and decrepit exorcist.

episodes.name: The Crew of Prince Mieszko I (2)
episodes.overview: Together with his loyal crew, Boner goes back in time to stop dark forces from interfering with the Christianization of Poland.

episodes.name: The Exorcist's Assistant (1)
episodes.overview: There’s a new exorcist in town and he’s looking for an assistant. Frustrated with never getting paid, Marcinek leaves Boner to join the competition.

episodes.name: Father (2)
episodes.overview: When Boner’s dad lands in the hospital, the pair go down memory lane to the beginning of the family’s feud with the Ruler of Hell.

episodes.name: The Maria Reactor
episodes.overview: An accident at the nuclear reactor opens a gateway to Hell. After taking over the business from Bogdan Boner, Marcin institutes a few new rules.

episodes.name: Cupid's Arrow
episodes.overview: Two demons prank Cupid by replacing his arrows with a deadly weapon, forcing the powerless god of love to seek help from Boner and his crew.

episodes.name: The Witches' Sabbath
episodes.overview: After Boner crashes the annual Bad Witches Sabbath in an attempt to kill the Supreme, she vows to track down and punish him.

episodes.name: The Second Level of Hell (1)
episodes.overview: When an assassination attempt goes awry, Boner follows two demons into Hell. The Ruler of Hell searches for someone who can take down his nemesis.

episodes.name: Apocalypse Now (2)
episodes.overview: The fallen demon dethrones the Ruler of Hell. Boner, Marcin, Domino and Natan join the fight against Hell's army as an apocalypse unfolds on Earth.

episodes.name: The Wave (3)
episodes.overview: Boner takes his lazy and unmotivated crew to patrol a war-torn area. The Ruler of Hell schemes to take back his power and throne but has no army.

episodes.name: The Palace Coup (4)
episodes.overview: The threat of a nightmare demon taunts Boner as he prepares a military operation. The Ruler of Hell and his allies sneak into the palace.

episodes.name: A Strange Day (1)
episodes.overview: Boner gets an unexpected request from a mysterious customer. Natan drops in with a job offer that takes Boner on a distant adventure.

episodes.name: Space Adventure (2)
episodes.overview: Boner, Natan and their crew embark on an interplanetary journey to take down the possessed pope who's wreaking havoc on a Martian space station.

episodes.name: The Blue Tit Mating Season
episodes.overview: While tracking down a demon, Boner accidentally interferes with Natan's undercover operation to take down a gang of thieves.

episodes.name: The Motel
episodes.overview: Boner and his team take a job investigating the mysterious disappearance of a cheating husband and his girlfriend at a roadside motel.

episodes.name: The Telekinesor
episodes.overview: Determined to score some free drinks from a supermarket, Boner and Marcin make a deal with a telekinetic demon — but their plan backfires.

episodes.name: The Baltic Sea Demon
episodes.overview: Boner and Domino explore the open waters and run into trouble. Marcin discovers that something dangerous haunts the sea and rushes to help his crew.

episodes.name: The Fountain of Youth (1)
episodes.overview: After the pope receives a letter from the head of the church regarding the Fountain of Youth, he assembles a team to search for the mythical spring.

episodes.name: The Fountain of Youth (2)
episodes.overview: Without the Popecopter, the team must travel to the Death Ravine by train. Meanwhile, Domino and Marcin take a strange trip through the desert.

episodes.name: The Fountain of Youth (3)
episodes.overview: On their demon-filled journey, the team stumbles upon an oasis, where they learn the new location of the Fountain of Youth from a helpful desert dweller.

episodes.name: Dwarfemons
episodes.overview: An old shoemaker hires Boner to investigate the vodka-loving, hard-partying dwarves who have been helping him finish his work after he goes to sleep.

episodes.name: Waferphobe (1)
episodes.overview: After a failed job, the crew returns to headquarters, where Boner receives a mysterious package — and Marcin falls in love with the delivery person.

episodes.name: Honest Boner (2)
episodes.overview: A whisperer places a curse on Boner to be an honest businessman, but following the rules nearly kills the team when they battle a monstrous catfish.

episodes.name: The Indian Curse
episodes.overview: Boner and his assistants go undercover as factory workers to catch the demon that's been possessing slaughtered chickens at a local poultry plant.

episodes.name: Krystian 125p, Part 1
episodes.overview: Eager to impress his crush, Marcin buys a run-down car and pays a crooked mechanic to repair it, but the car seems to have a mind of its own.

episodes.name: Krystian 125p, Part 2
episodes.overview: To escape from Demonatan's torment and torture, Boner and his team will need help from an unexpected ally. Later, Marcin must decide the fate of his car.

episodes.name: Demonatan, Part 1
episodes.overview: After arguing with his wife, Beelzebutt heads to the only place left in Hell to get an alcoholic drink. There, he strikes a bargain with Demonatan.

episodes.name: Demonatan, Part 2
episodes.overview: Beelzebutt gives Demonatan the power he needs to capture Boner, and soon, the ex-priest drags the exorcist — and Marcin — straight to Hell.

episodes.name: First Class MMA, Part 1
episodes.overview: Boner prepares for his fight against Tikto-Diablo in the pay-per-view event in Hell. Meanwhile, Domino tries to break his boss out of prison.

episodes.name: First Class MMA, Part 2
episodes.overview: Boner and Marcin fight for their lives in a Top Shelf MMA event. But victory won't be easy — Beelzebutt has a few tricks up his evil sleeves.

episodes.name: 1410 Recipes by Sister Leokadia
episodes.overview: To figure out which demon impregnated a young woman, Boner sets up an ambush at a local disco and uses Marcinek as the bait.

episodes.name: The Beast of the Apocalypse
episodes.overview: When a demon steals the Vatican's nuclear codes and launches a missile at the Baltic Sea, Boner must battle the beast it awakens.

episodes.name: Stray Dog
episodes.overview: Police tap Boner to investigate a stray dog that has attacked and killed multiple people. Could there be something supernatural behind it?

episodes.name: The Underdrinker
episodes.overview: After his ex-employee dies battling an alcoholic demon known as "the underdrinker" many years ago, Boner comes face-to-face with the man's ghost.

episodes.name: Father Domino
episodes.overview: Domino introduces Boner and Marcinek to the alien planet where he rules, but two Devilsaurs make a surprise appearance.

episodes.name: When in Fear, God is Dear
episodes.overview: An alien improperly buries his grandfather's remains, releasing a curse on his entire family. To reverse it, he'll need Domino's help.

episodes.name: The Interdimensional Oscillator
episodes.overview: When a stripper opens a portal to another dimension, Boner is whisked away by an otherworldly horror. It's up to Domino and Marcinek to get him back.

episodes.name: If Reggae's Your Song…
episodes.overview: Trapped in a world where he is the size of an insect, Boner's only escape involves the use of a cat toy.

episodes.name: What the Governor Can Do...
episodes.overview: After Domino bans the internet, he is forced to evade a coup against him with the help of a UFO — but he has no idea how to fly it.

episodes.name: The Figo Fagot Brothers
episodes.overview: Boner is hired by a ghost to deal with her two sons, who made a wish to become the best disco polo act on the planet.

episodes.name: The Crisis of Faith
episodes.overview: With the help of a herbalist, Boner manages to cheat death in order to reach purgatory and rescue a stranded archbishop.

episodes.name: ChatLPG
episodes.overview: When people start dying as ChatLPG manifests their darkest fears, Boner's only option is to launch a viral craze of his own.

episodes.name: Doctor Freakstoolcrap
episodes.overview: After an experiment by Beelzebutt goes horribly right, Boner must fight an immortal fusion of all the demons he has previously killed.
